commit.message:
Merge all post c-torture-1.45 entries to the main testsuite ChangeLog.

From-SVN: r33694

files.patch:
@@ -3,6 +3,10 @@
 	* gcc.c-torture/compile/20000504-1.c: New test.  Derived from
 	OpenSSL by Jason R Thorpe.
